name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that Country field is changed accordingly Zip Code
id: stories/site/widgets/EventDiscoveryWidget.story;(/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that Country field is changed accordingly Zip Code

testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that Country field is changed accordingly Zip Code #1: {zipCode=NW1, countryName=United Kingdom}

children.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
When change value of ZipCode {NW1} on Event Discovery Widget Page
Then the Country Field contains appropriate value {United Kingdom} on Event Discovery Widget Page

testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that Country field is changed accordingly Zip Code #2: {zipCode=40104, countryName=United States}

children.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
When change value of ZipCode {40104} on Event Discovery Widget Page
Then the Country Field contains appropriate value {United States} on Event Discovery Widget Page

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Event Discovery Widget
As a user of Ticketmaster Developer Portal
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites

title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that Country field is changed accordingly Zip Code
